    General Information

I am a 1st year graduate student enrolled in Master of Software Engineering at University of California, Irvine. I received my M.S. degree from the Graduate Institute of Networking and Multimedia, National Taiwan University in 2023. Moreover, I received B.S. in computer science and B.A. in economics at National Chengchi University in 2021.

My research interests include Recommender Systems, Natural Language Processing. More specifically, I am interested in developing effective machine learning techniques and efficient algorithms to solve real-world problems.

    Summary

  • Pursuing Master of Software Engineering degree with special interests in Backend Infrastructure & Data Science.
  • 4+ years of C++/Python and 2+ years of deep learning professional experience in research & software industries.
  • Proficient in Software Development and Agile Project Management, with communication and analytical skills.

    Educational Backgrounds
